full_summary:
# Federal Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number and Title

* Solicitation Number: WS4132986156
* Title (English): F3065-230023 - Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Technical Investigation and Engineering Services
* Title (French): F3065-230023 - Demande d'offre à commandes (DOC) pour les Services d'enquête technique et d'ingénierie

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS4132986156-Doc4134846414
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2023-09-07
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-04T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-07
* Expected Contract End Date: 2027-01-31
* Tender Status: Expired
* UNSPSC Codes:
	+ UNSPSC 25111500: Commercial marine craft
	+ UNSPSC 70171602: Water testing services
	+ UNSPSC 76101602: Asbestos removal or encapsulation
	+ UNSPSC 77101700: Environmental advisory services
	+ UNSPSC 77101901: Industrial site investigation
	+ UNSPSC 81100000: Professional engineering services
	+ UNSPSC 81101703: Engineering testing services
	+ UNSPSC 81102100: Ocean engineering

## Tender Requirements

* The successful contractor will provide technical investigation and engineering support services for Canadian Coast Guard vessels located in Quebec and Ontario.
* The required areas of expertise include:
	+ Technical investigation and engineering support
	+ Hazardous materials management
	+ Occupational health and safety
	+ Air quality assessment
	+ Water quality assessment
	+ Paint inspection
	+ Welding inspection

## Additional Information

* The solicitation is being issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG).
* The procurement method is competitive open bidding.
* The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
* The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* The contract delivery regions are Quebec (excluding National Capital Region) and Ontario (excluding National Capital Region).

## Contact Information

* Name: Gabriel Piras
* Email: [gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gabriel
